content: Truthfully, at that time, I didn't have the first idea about such talk: family links, blood relations or whatever.
translations: ita:In verità, in quel momento non ho avuto la prima idea su tali discussioni﹕ i legami familiari, i rapporti di sangue o qu
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by papabear (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
